attacks.name: Blazer
attacks.effect: Turn 1 of your face-down Prize cards face up. If it's a Fire Energy card, this attack does 50 more damage. (That Prize card remains face up for the rest of the game.)

attacks.name: Fireball Circus
attacks.effect: Discard any number of Fire Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
